articles.title: DPRK NDC Policy Department Issues Statement
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Policy Department Issues Statement
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK released the following statement Thursday:
					An acute situation that has persisted on the Korean Peninsula since the end of last year is now putting the peninsula on the verge of war.
					
					Much upset by the development, U.S. President Obama on April 11 reportedly stated in public of his intention to seek a negotiated and diplomatic settlement of the situation, saying that he does not want a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The chief of Chongwadae of south Korea, who is accustomed to currying favor with her master, let the "minister of Unification" make public a "statement". She even loudly spoke of "the authorities' proposal for dialogue to tide over the situation", a U-turn from her previous attitude of stoking confrontation. She used to say that there can be neither dialogue nor dispatch of a special envoy at present.
					
					The rhetoric about dialogue raised by the master and the stooge almost at the same time is a political decision made by them out of their calculation that they can never bring the DPRK into submission with military threats and "sanctions".
					
					It will be very much gratifying if they took a proper political decision to bring under control the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula with true interest in dialogue and negotiations.
					
					But matter is that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime cried out for starting dialogue in an appropriate environment, in an appropriate time and under appropriate condition despite their loud claim that the U.S. and south Korea made a U-turn toward dialogue and negotiations. The preconditions for dialogue raised by them include a stop to "provocative" remarks which the DPRK has so far been engaged in and demonstration of its intention to realize denuclearization and suspend missile launch. These are absurd ones.
					
					The U.S. and south Korea are opt-repeating "provocation" and "threats" from the DPRK, describing them as a stumbling block in the way of dialogue hoped for by them, while making the story of "north-south dialogue first and north Korea-U.S. dialogue next" an established fact as if the north had agreed to it.
					
					In this regard, the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK brings to light the nature of the prevailing situation and clarifies once again the principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					There is a Korean saying which goes "Thief calls stop thief".
					
					The U.S. and all kinds of hostile forces following it are the very ones who pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to such a grave phase as now.
					
					But the masterminds of the tense situation are portraying the DPRK as "provoker", while describing them as victims. It appears that they are not afraid of divine punishment.
					
					The "provocation" charge brought against the DPRK by the U.S. has become undisguised since they called the DPRK's legitimate and peaceful satellite launch as a "missile launch".
					
					The DPRK's working satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was confirmed to be going around its orbit by the North American Aero-space Defense Command. Russia and several other countries also admitted this and shortly ago a scientific and research institute of south Korea photographed the DPRK's satellite and made it public. But with their eyes shut to this stark fact, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are stepping up provocations against the DPRK.
					
					No wonder, the world public has now become increasingly vocal, condemning the U.S. and its allies' vicious provocation of getting the UN Security Council pass the "resolution on sanctions" and calling the satellite launch a "missile launch" as a "deception that disgraced justice and conscience" and an "act of blind men unable to discern skirt from trousers".
					
					The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" following the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch was a prelude to an open provocation by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime to inveigle all the forces following it to the worldwide campaign for isolating and stifling the DPRK. The nuclear war exercises being staged against the DPRK for nearly two months is a vicious, all-out military provocation.
					
					The U.S. even brought to south Korea and to waters off it super-large nuclear-powered carrier task force equipped with nuclear warheads, B-52, B-2 and other nuclear strategic bombers, nuclear-powered submarines capable of launching cruise guided shells and guided shell destroyers and even F-22 Stealth fighter formation to be used for making maiden strikes at the targets of the DPRK's army in the early days of war. They have stepped up the military provocation in an all-round way which now has reached the most dangerous phase of nuclear blackmail.
					
					The DPRK has never termed the U.S. satellite launches missile launches and attempted to urge the UN to adopt resolutions on sanctions under that pretext. It has never threatened and blackmailed the U.S. by deploying its elite armed forces in waters off the U.S.
					
					If the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are not wolves in human form, they should properly understand the word provocation and feel ashamed of their brigandish behaviors.
					
					It is another provocation against the DPRK that the U.S. urged the former to show the "will for denuclearization" as a precondition for dialogue.
					
					Denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula remains the unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					The joint declaration on denuclearization adopted by the north and the south early in the 1990s was a gain common to the nation as it was initiated by the DPRK with such will. 
					
					The U.S., however, introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea and its vicinity in league with puppet forces and began to escalating threat and blackmail against the DPRK, bringing this precious gain to naught.
					
					In order to cope with the U.S. escalating hostile policy and nuclear blackmail against the DPRK, it was compelled to have access to just nuclear force for self-defence.
					
					Accordingly, nothing is more foolish and brigandish than pressurizing the DPRK to show its "will for denuclearization" first.
					
					The nuclear force of the DPRK will always remain in the hands of its army and people as the most powerful means to protect the sovereignty of the country and its supreme interests and deal a retaliatory blow at the strongholds of aggression against it till the world including the U.S. is denuclearized.
					
					Not content with terming the DPRK's toughest countermeasures "provocations", the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime went the lengths of ceaselessly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are demonstrating their just will to stand up against the enemies' moves to isolate and stifle it and nuclear war moves against it. They are, however, describing this will as one for "consolidating the heir's system", "enhancing image" and "rallying unstable ranks". This is the thrice-cursed politically-motivated provocation.
					
					This is nothing but rigmarole let loose by the imbeciles who know nothing about the DPRK. 
					
					The bad-tempered U.S. and south Korean puppet regime can never imagine the tears of emotion shed by artillery women when the Supreme Commander took them to his arms and the warm feelings of service personnel and people shouting "hurrah" after jumping into cold sea waters. 
					
					As long as they persist in all sorts of provocations against the DPRK, its army and the people will steadily escalate the tough political and military counteractions as the days go by.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime should make a bold decision to take the following practical measures if they want to shirk off the historical responsibility for the prevailing grave situation on the Korean Peninsula, escape sledge-hammer retaliatory blows of the army and people of the DPRK and if they truly stand for dialogue and negotiations:
					
					First, they should immediately stop all their provocative acts against the DPRK and apologize for all of them.
					
					As the first phase, they should take the measure of retracting the UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions" cooked up under absurd pretexts. 
					
					They should bear in mind that doing so would be a token of good will towards the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean puppet forces should promptly halt all their anti-DPRK rackets, not linking their own mishaps such as Cheonan warship sinking incident and the "March 20 hacking case" to the north.
					
					Second, they should give formal assurances before the world that they would not stage again such nuclear war drills to threaten or blackmail the DPRK. 
					
					Dialogue can never go with war actions. 
					
					Frequent nuclear war maneuvers will only strain the situation and totally block the way of dialogue. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will not be taken in by sophism that the nuclear war drills being staged under its very nose are annual and defensive military actions for defending the U.S. and guaranteeing the security of south Korea. 
					
					Third, they should make a decision to withdraw all nuclear war means from south Korea and its vicinity and give up their attempt to reintroduce them as their immediate duty. 
					
					They should bear in mind that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula can begin with the pullout of the nuclear war means introduced by the U.S. and this may lead to the global denuclearization.
					
					The chief of Chongwadae should not forget that the prospect of south Korea may be rosy when the north's nukes are considered as a property common to the nation but south Korea is bound to go to ruin when it remains under the U.S. nuclear umbrella.
					
					The situation on the peninsula is directly linked with peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK together with the world peace-loving people who sympathize with justice and value conscience will closely follow the future behavior of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand on Inter-Korean Dialogue Remains Unchanged: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand on Inter-Korean Dialogue Remains Unchanged: CPRK Spokesman
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- There will be neither dialogue nor improved relations between the north and the south as long as south Korea persists in such hostile acts as enforcing sanctions against the DPRK, taking part in the acts to stifle it, deliberately accusing it of its space development and bolstering of its nuclear force and staging war exercises after massively introducing sophisticated war hardware into south Korea, declared a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement issued on Thursday.  
					Recently the south Korean authorities expressed "regret and disappointment" at the DPRK's rejection of their proposal for dialogue, the statement said, and went on:
					
					They went the lengths of making impudent remarks that "the north should make a right choice", jabbering that "it chilled the atmosphere and overturned the table".
					
					Had they have a true will to have dialogue, they should have halted all acts of hurting the dignity of the DPRK, stopped the north-targeted war exercises and smear campaign and given assurances to the nation that they would not resort to such hostile acts in the days ahead.
					
					However, a spate of invectives slandering the celebrations of the Day of the Sun was let loose and such thrice-cursed crime as infringing upon the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK was committed in the heart of Seoul in broad daylight at the tacit connivance of the south Korean authorities.
					
					Puppet minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin and other warmongers kicked up confrontation hysteria, crying out for "a total war, strong counteraction and stern and decisive punishment."
					
					Worse still, the chief of Chongwadae let loose a whole string of jargons seriously hurting the dignity of the north. She blustered that "it is necessary to terminate the vicious cycle of renegotiating and assisting the north when it poses a threat and perpetrates a provocation and that such threat and provocation would isolate the north."
					
					All these facts prove that the south Korean authorities were compelled to propose dialogue under the pressure of the public, having no sincere heart.
					
					They clearly indicate that the proposed dialogue is nothing but a deceptive artifice to cover up their act of having pushed the situation to a state of war, tide over the crisis and mislead the public opinion in a bid to shift the responsibility onto the north. 
					
					The south Korean authorities are employing sleight of hand as regards the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone but the crisis there most vividly reflects the present state of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					They, along with their American master, are still talking such nonsense as "denuclearization" in the north in a bid to make a bargain over its nukes. They would be well advised to drop such daydream.
					
					As a matter of fact, the DPRK was technically at a nuclear war with the U.S. 
					
					The U.S. has posed a threat to the DPRK with all its ultramodern nuclear strategic weapons and hardware.
					
					This showdown was sparked by the U.S. and other hostile forces as they took issue with the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					The confrontation maniacs should properly understand that the principled stance of the DPRK will never change, warned the statement.

articles.title: Congratulations to Montenegrin President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Montenegrin President
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on April 13 sent a congratulatory message to Philip Byanovic on his reelection as president of Montenegro.
					Kim in the message wished the president of Montenegro success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country, adding that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Montenegro would steadily develop.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health and Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education of the Education Commission.
					
					Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan said in his speech that the President had special relations with Yasser Arafat and showed revolutionary obligation in the national liberation struggle.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and leading the DPRK to progress and prosperity, he noted, adding:
					
					The Palestinian people are standing together with the friendly Korean people who are waging the struggle for achieving the country's reunification in a peaceful way without foreign interference.
					
					Kim Yong Il said in his speech that the friends of Palestine celebrated the Day of the Sun together with the Korean people. This is a reflection of the greatest reverence for the President, he added:
					
					Kim Jong Un has wisely led the Korean people with his talented wisdom and many-sided leadership ability.
					
					The Korean people will extend invariable support and solidarity to the Palestinian people in their just cause to retake the legitimate national rights and found an independent state with Kuds as its capital.

articles.title: DPRK Qualified for 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship

DPRK Qualified for 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship

articles.title: Monument Erected at Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Monument Erected at Huichon Power Station
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A monument titled "Undying Feats to Be Conveyed Long with Huichon Power Station" was erected at the power station.
					The power station is associated with undying leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un who worked heart and soul to carry out the grand plan of President Kim Il Sung on building a large power base in the Chongchon and Jangja rivers.
					
					Kim Jong Il opened a grand blueprint to build the power station till the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. He visited the construction site in March, Juche 98 (2009), clearly indicated the orientation and way of building. He took revolutionary steps to push forward the construction of the power station with the whole party, army and people involved.
					
					Service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and employees of the power station successfully erected the monument with natural granite with one mind to convey long the feats of the peerlessly great men.
					
					A ceremony took place on Wednesday.
					
					Present there were Ryu Yong Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Tok Hun, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, service personnel of the KPISF, shock brigade members, employees of the power station and other people in Huichon City.
					
					At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the monument, being briefed on it.

articles.title: Mt. Oga Boasts of Many Species of Plants
articles.content:
Mt. Oga Boasts of Many Species of Plants
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Mt. Oga, standing high between Hwaphyong County of Jagang Province and Kim Hyong Jik County of Ryanggang Province, boasts of many species of plants.
					It has a natural reserve covering more than 1 740 hectares of forests.
					
					The reserve is forested mainly with the species of fir, Abies nesphrolepis, spruce and ash tree.
					
					It is abundant in medical plants, including forest asiabell, with various species of plants fairly distributed.
					
					The Mt. Oga pine-nut tree, one of the most age-long trees, is under protection as a natural treasure of the country.
					
					The umbrella-shaped linden in the reserve is believed to be alive from around the year 1430.

Participants in Art Festival Visit Museum of Weapons and Equipment of KPA
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival visited the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Thursday.

articles.title: Third April Spring People's Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
Third April Spring People's Art Festival Closes
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Third April Spring People's Art Festival was closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday. It was opened here on Apr. 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).  
					During the festival artistes of art organizations here and local areas, members of art squads and itinerant art squads, people of various circles and overseas Korean artistes sang high praises of the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un and represented the Korean people's pride of leading a worthwhile life of the sun's nation.
					
					The performances were watched by senior party and state officials, service personnel, people, youth and students.
					
					Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and other officials concerned, participants in the festival and artistes.
					
					Group prizes went to 27 units, prizes of ensemble to 19 art pieces and 24 organizations, prize of creation to 19 persons, individual prize to 20 persons and prize of merit to 7 organizations and four persons.
					
					A song and dance performance was given by the artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the ceremony.

articles.title: Gem-Stone Sculpture, Gift to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Gem-Stone Sculpture, Gift to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK is a gem-stone sculpture, a gift given to President Kim Il Sung by a trading company in Dandong, China, in April, Juche 91 (2002). 
					The company officials made a decision to present a gift to Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his 90th birth anniversary, out of profound reverence for him.
					
					The gift was made with a gem stone dug out of the ground 100 meters deep in an area of China.
					
					The waves depicted in the lower part of the gift represent the Korean people's history marked by miseries, while the ivory and elephant under a palm tree symbolize the happy life enjoyed by the Korean people in the era of prosperity provided by Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: 145th Anniversary of Repelling Intrusion by U.S. Warships Marked
articles.content:
145th Anniversary of Repelling Intrusion by U.S. Warships Marked
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar of social scientists took place at the Academy of Social Sciences Thursday on the lapse of 145 years since the U.S. imperialists' warships Shenandoah and China intruded into Korea only to be repelled.
					The Shenandoah invaded the region in the lower reaches of the River Taedong in March 1868 according to the scenario for aggression of the then U.S. government and went on the rampage, firing guns, killing people and plundering. The enemies aboard the warship forced Korea to sign an unequal and shackling treaty.
					
					In the same year, the U.S. aggressors exhumed Prince Nam Yon's Tomb and mapped out a plan to use his remains as bait for securing a shackling treaty from Korea. They sent gangsters' group aboard warship China to commit the barbarous acts.
					
					The Korean people held off the U.S. imperialists' aggression warships and demonstrated the nation's spirit and stamina.
					
					The ships' intrusion into Korea was the product of the U.S. criminal moves that envisaged swallowing up Korea and turning it into an outpost for invading Asia, the speakers said, adding:
					
					The U.S. imperialists' moves to invade Korea became more pronounced in the middle of the 20th century.
					
					An example is the U.S. imperialists' military occupation of south Korea after the defeat of the Japanese imperialists and the moves to provoke a war against the DPRK.
					
					The speakers said the U.S. imperialist aggressors should draw a serious lesson from their defeat in the Korean War, and not rush headlong.
					
					Present at the seminar were officials, teachers, researchers, lecturers, reporters and editors in the fields of social science, education, preservation of national heritages and mass media.

articles.title: DPRK People Determined to Wipe Out S. Korean Puppets
articles.content:
DPRK People Determined to Wipe Out S. Korean Puppets
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The atrocities of the south Korean puppet group against the DPRK have become more extreme with each passing day.
					The group committed a thrice-cursed crime of holding an anti-DPRK rally in downtown Seoul and dared burn portraits of the great men symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with viciously slandering the celebrations held in the DPRK to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), President Kim Il Sung's birthday.
					
					It is an ill-intentioned provocation aimed to lead the tense situation created on the Korean Peninsula to an outbreak of nuclear war at all costs.
					
					Seized with surging rage at the moves to do harm to the mainstay of their faith, the DPRK people are now filled with determination to reduce Seoul into the sea of flames.
					
					Ri Yong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), told KCNA:
					
					It is a politically-motivated move to dare insult the dignity of the peerlessly great men, which have been kept dearly in the hearts of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					It can be done only by the traitors to the nation.
					
					We can never leave them alive.
					
					The crime was committed at the instigation and connivance of the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					Historically, the puppet authorities have harshly suppressed the righteous struggle of progressive organizations, while standing for the anti-DPRK rackets waged by ultra-rightist conservative organizations.
					
					We, servicepersons, will wipe out all of them to the last man.
					
					Jo Nam Hyok, a non-commissioned officer of the KPISF, said:
					
					The group of traitors has committed politically-motivated provocation even under the situation similar to wartime.
					
					Once the Supreme Commander gives us an order of action, we will blow up Seoul, the hotbed of crimes, and the dens of gangsters.

articles.title: DPRK People Call U.S. Proposal for Dialogue Deceptive
articles.content:
DPRK People Call U.S. Proposal for Dialogue Deceptive
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. rhetoric about "dialogue" has angered the DPRK people.
					They regard the rhetoric as insulting and deceptive one. 
					
					In this regard, Choe Jung Gol, a citizen living in Phyongchon District, told KCNA:
					
					I have just heard a statement released by the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC).  
					
					As clarified in the statement, there will never be dialogue as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy towards the DPRK. The U.S. and its followers are wholly to blame for the highly volatile situation created on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					They termed the DPRK's satellite launch for the peaceful purposes "missile launch" and even cooked up the UN resolutions on sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					Moreover, they have launched nuclear war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					This is as good as an act of making light of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. should fully implement the practical measures suggested in the NDC statement, before anything else.
					
					Ko Song Hyok, a citizen living in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province, said:
					
					The U.S. claims that it will opt for dialogue when the DPRK shows its will for denuclearization first and on the other hand it is resorting to nuclear war maneuvers, ceaselessly introducing huge nuclear strike means into south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					Our efforts for beefing up the nukes both qualitatively and quantitatively will never ceased, as long as the U.S. continues to pose nuclear threats to the DPRK
					
					Kim Yong Ok, a resident living in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province, said:
					
					The U.S. should squarely understand the steadfast will of the DPRK army and people to unfailingly win in a showdown with it.
					
					The DPRK's sacred war against the U.S. will last until the Americans treat the DPRK people in a dignified way.

articles.title: DPRK People Seized with Rage at S. Korean Puppet Group's Hideous Crime
articles.content:
DPRK People Seized with Rage at S. Korean Puppet Group's Hideous Crime
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The ultimatum of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army disclosing the hideous crime committed by the south Korean puppet group has lashed the DPRK people into fury.
					According to the ultimatum, the puppet group instigated gangsters to set ablaze portraits of the peerlessly great men in the downtown Seoul on the Day of the Sun (April 15), President Kim Il Sung's birthday.
					
					The crime was committed not long after the firing exercises targeting the DPRK Flag and the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and the attempted plot to bring down statues in the DPRK in the period of the traitor Lee Myung Bak's regime.
					
					Not different from the previous regime, the current south Korean regime has fostered heinous crimes aimed at doing harm to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, in collusion with the United States.
					
					Ro Su Ik, a citizen living in Sunchon City, South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					"It is foolish for the group of traitors to try to undermine the single-minded unity with such despicable politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					They will never understand the DPRK people's will to devotedly defend the supreme dignity."
					
					Pang Chol Bom, a citizen living in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, said:
					
					"I can hardly repress my resentment at the indelible crime committed by the gangsters at the connivance of the puppet regime. It is as good as pointing an accusing finger at the sun. A stick is fit for mad dog. Patience has its limit."

articles.title: Confrontation and Dialogue, War and Peace Cannot Go Together: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Confrontation and Dialogue, War and Peace Cannot Go Together: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- High-ranking U.S. officials are vying with each other to talk about dialogue. 
					They said that "the U.S. keeps the door open to north Korea so it may make other option", "Obama clarified more than once the U.S. is ready for dialogue and negotiations if north Korea takes part in a sincere discussion" and "the U.S. has no intention to attack north Korea".
					
					This is, in fact, nothing but a base artifice to hide the true colors as the arch criminal who wantonly infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and created the worst tension on the Korean Peninsula and evade the responsibility for it.
					
					The U.S. completely lost the face to talk about dialogue with the DPRK as it has committed hideous criminal acts against the latter.
					
					The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating "a resolution on harsh sanctions" against the DPRK in wanton denial of its right to satellite launch, pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war. 
					
					It is staging joint military drills with huge armed forces and nuclear attack means involved, posing the biggest-ever threat of nuclear strike to the DPRK.
					
					Even at this moment when the U.S. is talking about "dialogue", its strategic nuclear strike means including super-large nuclear-powered carriers are watching for a chance to make a preemptive strike, operating in waters off the peninsula. Nuclear submarines and the U.S. forces including thousands of U.S. marines are being rapidly dispatched to the operational theatres on the peninsula.
					
					The U.S. talk about dialogue at this time is nothing but a cunning behavior to pass the buck for the situation inching close to a war to the DPRK and a disgusting deceptive artifice to mislead the public opinion.
					
					The U.S.-touted dialogue goes to clearly prove once again that its scenario for a nuclear war remains unchanged as it is keen to invade the DPRK by force of arms while stepping up the preparations for a war behind the scene of dialogue. This once again confirms its nuclear war policy towards the DPRK and is another unpardonable hostile act against it.
					
					It is by no means fortuitous that the U.S. put forth the restraint on the DPRK's "additional provocations", fulfillment of international commitments and measure for denuclearization as preconditions for dialogue. 
					
					In a nutshell, the U.S. wants the DPRK to dismantle its nukes, the treasured sword for self-defence, before starting dialogue.
					
					It is absurd rhetoric for the U.S. to urge the DPRK to abandon all its rights and capabilities for self-defence in face of the former's brandishing of nuclear stick and come out for dialogue with bare hands.
					
					By origin, the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula had been derailed by the moves of the U.S. for a nuclear war and finally had come to an end.
					
					The U.S. has shipped nuclear weapons into south Korea since several decades ago and threatened the DPRK with nukes, spawning the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. It is illogical and preposterous for it to urge the DPRK to dismantle its nukes and commit itself to their "nonuse."
					
					The dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S. should strictly be based on the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality.
					
					There can be no genuine dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S. unless the latter rolls back its hostile policy toward the former and lifts its nuclear threat and blackmail against Pyongyang.
					
					Confrontation and dialogue, war and peace can never go together.
					
					The DPRK will escalate its military counteractions for self-defence unless the U.S. halts its nuclear war drills and pulls back its war hardware for aggression from south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails WPK's New Revolutionary Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails WPK's New Revolutionary Line
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force indicates the way of bringing earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article. It goes on:
					President Kim Il Sung clarified the line on simultaneously developing the economy and defence upbuilding for the first time in history at the Fifth Plenary Meeting of the Fourth Central Committee of the WPK in Juche 51 (1962).
					
					For a long period of leading the revolution leader Kim Jong Il thoroughly implemented the line, leading the fierce nuclear showdown with the U.S. to victory after victory through his Songun politics.
					
					The new strategic line of the WPK means continuation of the line on simultaneously developing the economy and defence upbuilding and its development onto a new higher stage and a strategic line on bolstering capability for self-defence with nuclear force as a mainstay.
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggressors are the principal enemy of the DPRK in the struggle for implementing the previous line and in the on-going all-out offensive for successfully putting into practice the recent strategic line. Its targets remain unchanged.
					
					Peace, prosperity and people's happy life are guaranteed by the powerful nuclear force.
					
					It is necessary to bolster capability for self-defence with nuclear force as a mainstay. Herein lies the basic characteristics of a new line of the WPK. Its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force is a strategic line for building a thriving nation as it makes it possible to bolster the country's defence capability in every way by developing the nuclear force, a legacy left by Kim Jong Il, and at the same time channel greater efforts into economic construction to enable the people to fully enjoy luxury and glory under socialism.-0- 
					
					Steadfast is the faith of the army and people of the DPRK to perform heroic feats in an all-out action with the U.S. and in building a thriving nation through bold offensive, all-people do-or-die battle, taking hold on the new line.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates a bylined article to the 15th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) comprehensively deals with the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung and sets forth the five-point policy for great national unity, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					The policy provided the Korean nation with a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for glorifying on a higher level the President's great idea of national unity and feats performed by him and encouraged it to advance along the road of independence and reunification with deeper confidence. 
					
					During this period, all the Koreans aspiring after patriotism have been united close  under the banner of national independence and the movement for national reunification has become a nationwide movement involving Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and a mass movement grouping the people of different social standings irrespective of ideology, political view and party affiliation. Signal achievements have been made in the development of the inter-Korean relations and the movement of the country's reunification thanks to the June 15 era of reunification. This is a clear proof of validity and vitality of the five-point policy for great national unity set forth by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The prevailing situation requires all Koreans to turn out in a nation-wide all-people resistance, drop the curtain on the aggressors and traitors' moves to invade the DPRK and realize the historic desire of the country's reunification at an early date, true to the five-point policy for great national unity set forth by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					In order to carry out the historic task of the nation, all the Koreans should mercilessly punish the U.S. and the puppet group of traitors for bringing the danger of a nuclear war to this land.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threat Can Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threat Can Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will direct bigger efforts to bolstering capability for self-defence now that the U.S. is resorting to nuclear war maneuvers, ceaselessly introducing huge nuclear strike means into the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					The situation on the peninsula is getting tenser due to the U.S. frantic nuclear war maneuvers, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					In order to cover up its aggressive nature, the U.S. is urging the DPRK not to provoke and blustering that the DPRK's "option" would entail horrible consequences.
					
					The U.S. can never evade the blame for the touch-and-go situation but will keenly realize the will of the army and people of the DPRK to take revenge upon it. 
					
					An all-out war to be staged in the ground, seas and air will be a merciless war in which everything of the enemies would be reduced to ashes at one go, leaving no one to sign a paper of surrender.
					
					The DPRK codified its access to nuclear weapons in order to put an end to the era when the U.S. could threaten the DPRK with nukes, build a country where all people enjoy wealth and glory under socialism and contribute to the peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the cause of global independence.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to give up its scenario to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Warned to Abandon Foolish Ambition: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Warned to Abandon Foolish Ambition: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military belligerent forces, stunned at the results of a computer mock war that left more than 100 000 puppet troops dead some time into an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula, are crying out for "scorched-land strategy" to massively and preemptively launch missiles to avoid disasters. They move to include it in OPLAN 5015, a new war scenario against the DPRK. To this end, they scheme to introduce war hardware, claiming acquisition of the capacity to "strike whole areas of the north" by long-range air-to-ground missiles.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is a very belligerent move to round off the operation system for "preemptive strike" on the north and tackle it under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					Lurking behind the "scorched-land strategy" touted by the puppet forces is a sinister intention to shore up morale of the puppet army that runs low in the face of the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent and the series of toughest countermeasures, and remove war phobia prevalent in south Korea even a bit.
					
					What matters is that the puppet forces' reckless hysteria can lead to a nuclear war against the north any time.
					
					But they should clearly know that if they dare opt for the "scorched-land strategy" with foolish ambition, they will lead to their miserable end.
					
					We disregard the "scorched-land strategy" called for by the puppet forces, the colonial war servants of foreign forces. Their strategy will be reduced to a dead paper in the face of merciless nuclear strike of the DPRK.
					
					We are just concerned about the land of south Korea that will turn to ashes and innocent south Koreans and their properties that can be damaged due to the puppet forces' reckless provocation.
					
					The moment the puppets make the slightest move of provocation, all of them will be wiped out.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned Not to Misjudge DPRK's Will
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned Not to Misjudge DPRK's Will
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are talking nonsense that the "north will not start an all-out war in actuality" and "it resorts to brinkmanship tactics to increase the negotiability". They went the lengths of saying that "residents in the north lead a peaceful life", describing the toughest measures of the DPRK as "extreme psychological warfare" and "propaganda warfare".
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is a scream made by criminals and traitors wrapped in the ill foreboding.
					
					The final battle launched by the army and people of the DPRK is by no means bluff or threat but practical military actions to defend the sovereignty of the nation and the dignity of its supreme leadership and certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					We will show no mercy to the hostile forces encroaching upon the sovereignty and interests of the country. We can never pardon those daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, its life and soul.
					
					The puppet forces are describing the drive being waged by the Korean people all out in building a thriving socialist nation as "a peaceful life". They should not talk such nonsense. The people in the DPRK are waging a grand battle to annihilate enemies, each with a rifle in one hand and a hammer or a sickle in the other hand.
					
					The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army is waiting for an order, keeping itself fully ready for a war.
					
					The U.S. colonial war servants have become vocal about "psychological war", misjudging the resolute will of the DPRK. This is a ridiculous political cartoon. The puppet forces committed so big crimes that they can not rid south Korea of war phobia and avoid the crisis.
					
					Time will prove that DPRK's toughest countermeasures are by no means "psychological warfare" or "propaganda warfare" but practical military action measures.

articles.title: S. Korean, U.S. Media Accused of Passing Buck for Crisis in Korea to North
articles.content:
S. Korean, U.S. Media Accused of Passing Buck for Crisis in Korea to North
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA)-- An article titled "Media are to blame for straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula" contributed by a south Korean media man was posted on Voice of People, an internet broadcasting service of south Korea, on April 13. 
					Drawing attention to the fact that news reports released by media of south Korea and the U.S. on the situation on the peninsula do not help correctly grasp what is truth, the article added that this is because they do not properly introduce the north.
					
					Media of south Korea and U.S. are faithfully playing the role of a weapon attacking the north, it charged, and continued:
					
					The above-said media are shifting all the blames for the crisis on the peninsula onto the north. 
					
					They accuse the north of a satellite launch, without taking into consideration at all the fact that such launch pertains to sovereignty under international law.
					
					Over the last half century since satellite launch began, it was only the north that was subject to international sanctions for its satellite launch. 
					
					Space industry is directly linked with the future of a state and its economic development. To deter advance into space is little short of blocking the state's development and threatening the right to exist.
					
					The U.S. examined the use of nukes during the Korean War and since the middle of the 1950s it has pushed forward a military strategy, drills, etc. presupposing the use of nukes on the peninsula, and posed a threat to the north. 
					
					At present, too, the U.S. is demanding the north side drop its nuclear weapons, making its provision of a nuclear umbrella to the south side an established fact. This lacks persuasive power. 
					
					South Korean media do not seriously deal with this point.
					
					They almost fully speak for the U.S. as regards the north's satellite launch and nuclear test, the UN "sanctions against the north," Key Resolve maneuvers, the north's nullification of the Armistice Agreement, etc.
					
					As regards the Kaesong Industrial Zone, some media and political camp of the south asserted that the north has gained a fabulous amount of foreign currency and that money is being diverted to the purpose of the north's nuclear test, etc.
					
					Some media recently floated the story that the north is sparking off a crisis with the KIZ, its alleged source of money, left in tact. 
					
					The KIZ may be explained from various angles. It is the military aspect of the KIZ that the south Korean conservative forces never mention when referring to the KIZ.
					
					The conservative forces' mum about this point is little short of making a mockery of the KIZ.
					
					Most media of the south only release news reports about the north's "provocations" without clarifying at all what is the core of the crisis on the peninsula and what is a fundamental solution to it.
					
					Even against the backdrop of the world's strong criticism the south's media are free to release reports terming the U.S. a perfect military patron of south Korea but describing the north as a diehard "enemy."
					
					They are busy reporting about ceaseless drills of U.S. sophisticated weapons from the U.S. eyes. They play the role of hyping the effect of the U.S. "demonstration of forces" against the north.
					
					Media of the south are bound to the "Security Law" suppressing the freedom of thinking.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held an event at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China on Monday, the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there were Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong and other officials of the association, Koreans in China, the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, a DPRK delegation on a visit to China and members of the DPRK branches working in the three provinces in Northeast China.
					
					On hand were a deputy section chief of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin Provincial People's Government, the director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin City People's Government, the vice director of the Jilin City Public Security Bureau, the principal of the school, etc.
					
					The participants laid floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the school and made a bow.
					
					A meeting of the association was held to celebrate the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Choe Su Bong in his report praised Kim Il Sung as a legendary hero who defeated two imperialisms in one generation to save and glorify the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					The reporter called on all Koreans in China to get united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in one mind and turn out as one in the drive to glorify the new century of Kim Il Sung's Korea as annuals of prosperity and proud victory.
					
					There took place on the same day a photo and book exhibition on the theme of "Exploits of Comrade Kim Il Sung will be everlasting" and "Comrade Kim Jong Un and Korea today". Then followed an art performance and sports and amusement games.
					
					On April 14, the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting at the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings. 
					
					A meeting of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China took place in Shenyang on April 13.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Escape Divine Punishment: Korean in China
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Escape Divine Punishment: Korean in China
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Traitors of south Korea can never escape divine punishment as they hurt what all Koreans keep more precious than their lives. Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, said this when interviewed by KCNA on Thursday.
					The south Korean puppet forces prodded gangsters to hold an anti-DPRK meeting in downtown Seoul in broad daylight at which they committed monstrous crimes, he said, and went on:
					
					The present grave situation clearly proves that south Korean puppet forces, steeped in confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones, should be punished sternly.
					
					Resentments of all Koreans are running high at the acts of confrontation maniacs pointing their fingers at the sky while staging the frantic large-scale joint war maneuvers to stifle the DPRK in league with their master.
					
					No one should be allowed to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					Provocateurs are subject to miserable defeat, and final victory is in store for the defenders of justice.
					
					Koreans in China living under the sky above Mt. Paektu are greatly encouraged by the service personnel and people all out in the struggle to defend the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					We are convinced that the army and people of the country will wipe out the traitors committing crimes to the last man by learning from the noble example set by the revolutionary forerunners who reliably defended the headquarters of revolution with arms.

articles.title: Korean People Will Reunify Country: Juche Idea Follower
articles.content:
Korean People Will Reunify Country: Juche Idea Follower
Pyongyang, April 18 (KNCA) -- We the Juche idea followers in Latin America are convinced that the Korean people will reunify the country as they have the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the top posts of revolution.
					Eleazar Rubio Aldaran, visiting secretary general of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, said this on Wednesday when interviewed by KCNA.
					
					The south Korean authorities are staging the large-scale war maneuvers for aggression in league with the U.S., aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula, he said, and went on:
					
					The south Korean puppet authorities are engrossed in confrontation with fellow countrymen, seeking the policy of depending on foreign forces.
					
					Korea has not yet been reunified due to the puppet authorities resorting to the confrontation moves, serving the U.S. as their grandfather.
					
					To cope with the prevailing situation the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army sent an ultimatum to the south Korean authorities.
					
					Just is the step taken by the DPRK to cope with the dangerous provocation moves of the hostile forces.
					
					World people loving peace and justice are extending full support to the Korean people in their struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country and reunify it.
					
					The south Korean authorities should stop at once the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen. They should rely on the independent forces of the nation, not on foreign forces, architect of division.
					
					If they truly want dialogue and negotiation, they should opt for the work for national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia on April 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The participants laid bouquets before a full-length painting of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and made bows.
					
					Kim Chil Song, chairman of the confederation, made a speech.
					
					Kim Il Sung's was the life of a peerlessly great man who devoted himself to the freedom and independence of the country, people's happiness and world peace, he said, adding: The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Other speakers said that Kim Il Sung built the self-supporting national economy and powerful self-defensive capabilities with his outstanding wisdom and far-sightedness and took warm care of overseas Koreans with his paternal love.
					
					They vowed to conduct positive activities to lay bare the nature of war provocation moves of the U.S. and its allies and join in the anti-war peace campaign as required by the present situation.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					They included meetings in Russia, Cuba and Iran, lecture in Tanzania and film shows in Thailand and Austria from April 9 to 11.
					
					Displayed in the venues of the events were photos showing the noble revolutionary careers and undying feats of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books dealing with their personalities.
					
					Korean films shown included "Arms of Korea".
					
					The chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK in his speech praised Kim Il Sung as  iron-willed brilliant commander who led the anti-Japanese armed struggle, liberating Korea, and led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory, bringing about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					The greatest feat Kim Il Sung performed was that he successfully settled the issue of the succession to the revolutionary cause of Juche, he stressed.
					
					The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification lauded Kim Il Sung for turning the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, and performing undying feats in carrying out the cause of national reunification and the human cause of independence.
					
					The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said Kim Il Sung was a great thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea, clearly indicating the way to be followed by mankind in the era of independence.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Austria.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Thongil, a newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on April 11 carried an article titled "Significant day" to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					It carried a portrait of Kim Il Sung and a photo of his old home at Mangyongdae.
					
					The DPRK is celebrating April 15, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, as a national holiday every year, it said, and went on:
					
					The day called the Day of the Sun marked the beginning of the Korean history.
					
					On this traditional holiday, floral baskets and bouquets are laid before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing in the heart of Pyongyang and tribute is paid to them at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where they lie in state. The April Spring Friendship Art Festival is held in Pyongyang on this significant day.
					
					Performances are given at the art festival by foreign artistes who come to Korea, the land of morning calm.
					
					Kimilsungia festival and shows take place in different parts of the DPRK on the April spring holiday.
					
					The IAAF-Mangyongdae Prize Marathon is held with splendor to significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					
					An endless stream of foreign delegations, workers, soldiers, students and Pyongyangites visit Mangyongdae to express profound reverence for Kim Il Sung.
					
					This year, too, splendid celebrations are taking place in Pyongyang to mark his 101st birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Romania
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Romania.
					The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed during their lifetimes. It also indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their idea and exploits.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Nepali Paper
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The full text of the historic report made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by the Nepali paper Arpan on April 12.
					The report sets forth a new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and developing revolution.
					
					The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Joint National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
articles.content:
Joint National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- There took place in Helsinki on April 10 a Finnish joint national seminar on the Juche idea to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed in the venue of the seminar were photos of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Also on display were photos and books introducing the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					Present at the seminar were figures of the Finnish Communists' League, the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Finnish Paektu Association and the Finland-DPRK Association and other Juche idea followers.
					
					The participants placed bunches of flowers before portraits of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a speech.
					
					He said that the President, a great thinker and theoretician, founded the Juche idea in his early years and successfully applied it, liberating the country and building a genuine people's society on the land of Korea.
					
					The Juche idea was recognized as the permanent idea guiding the human cause of independence for its scientific accuracy, originality and great vitality.
					
					Kim Jong Il, creditable successor to the revolutionary idea of the President, formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and bolstered up the country's defence capability in every way to cope with the imperialists' escalating military threat and moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					Under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK is demonstrating its might as the country which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					Referring to the successes achieved by the national committee in the work to study and disseminate the Juche idea, the speaker expressed the will to extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle.
					
					The speakers clearly explained and proved the validity, scientific accuracy and the truth of the Juche idea.
					
					A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Political Figure of Tajikistan Supports Just Struggle of DPRK
articles.content:
Political Figure of Tajikistan Supports Just Struggle of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, released a statement on April 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					He noted that the President, who is an eternal leader of the DPRK, was a great revolutionary and benevolent father of the people, who devoted his whole life to the struggle for the prosperity of the country.
					
					He continued:
					
					Thanks to the wise leadership of the President, the country emerged a political and ideological power and a military power and won victory after victory in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the evermore undisguised nuclear war racket of the U.S. 
					
					To cope with it, the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army declared the will to take decisive counteractions for protecting the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership through actual military actions and all the people entered the final stage of the showdown with the U.S.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un set forth a new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., the WPK and aroused all the people to implement it.
					
					The DPRK will surely win a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists as the powerful KPA is under his experienced command and the people are single-mindedly united behind the WPK.

articles.title: Social Body of Democratic Congo Backs Decisive Stance of DPRK
articles.content:
Social Body of Democratic Congo Backs Decisive Stance of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo in a statement on April 3 expressed full support for the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force advanced at the March 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea. It also supported the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army which declared the decisive will of the army and the people of the DPRK to take counter-actions through actual military actions.
					The statement of the committee said:
					
					We, on behalf of the world peace-loving people, strongly demand the U.S. immediately stop its DPRK-targeted provocations, condemning the U.S. frantic reinforcement of the nuclear force to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					The unjust and criminal actions of the UN Security Council can never be overlooked.
					
					Tolerating injustice will put world peace at great peril.
					
					The only way out for the U.S. is to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: WPK's New Line Backed by Beninese Figure
articles.content:
WPK's New Line Backed by Beninese Figure
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, issued a statement on April 9 in support of the Workers' Party of Korea's new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force.
					He said that the news of the March 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., the WPK is instilling great energy and courage into the Korean people and other progressives aspiring after socialism.
					
					He noted:
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, set forth a new strategic line which serves as a landmark in speeding up the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					The said line means inheritance and development of the line of simultaneously developing economy and defence upbuilding  laid down by President Kim Il Sung, and fully implemented by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					To further bolster up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense is the only option for the DPRK to keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					Precisely for this reason Kim Jong Un set forth a new line making it possible to direct big efforts to pushing forward economic construction and improving the standard of the people's living, while bolstering up the nuclear force on the basis of the Juche-oriented nuclear industry.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN aclara posicion de principios de RPDC
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN aclara posicion de principios de RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 18 la siguiente declaracion: 
					La situacion critica de la Peninsula Coreana iniciada desde finales del ano pasado no se libera del borde de guerra. 
					
					Segun trascendidos, el presidente estadounidense Obama, muy aturdido por la gravedad del caso, anuncio el 11 de abril pasado la voluntad de resolver el problema por via diplomatica mediante el dialogo y negociaciones insistiendo en que no desea el estallido de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Tambien, la duena de Chongwadae, acostumbrada a lisonjear a su amo, hizo al ministro de Unificacion publicar una "declaracion". Y al cambiar de repente su actitud conflictiva con la cual decia que en la actualidad no hay dialogo ni el enviado especial, dio a la publicidad la "propuesta de dialogo de autoridades para salvar la situacion dificil".
					
					El dialogo de que hablan simultaneamente el amo y su lacayo es una decision politica sacada de la conclusion de que no podrian doblegar a la RPDC con la amenaza militar o la "sancion". 
					
					Seria una cosa afortunada si ellos tomaran esta decision politica racional para salvar la situacion grave creada en la Peninsula Coreana teniendo de veras algun interes en el dialogo y negociaciones. 
					
					Pero, lo problematico es que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos hablan tanto como si cambiaran de repente el rumbo hacia el dialogo y negociaciones, por una parte, y por la otra, insisten en que iniciarian el dialogo en un periodo y ambiente adecuados cuando el Norte de Corea pare las palabras y conductas "provocativas" y demuestre primero la voluntad de lograr la desnuclearizacion y no hacer el lanzamiento de misil. 
					
					Y dicen que la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de la RPDC estorban el dialogo y negociaciones deseados por si mismos insistiendo en el "dialogo Norte-Sur primero, y el dialogo Norte de Corea-Estados Unidos despues" como si lo hubiera acordado con alguien. 
					
					Con respecto a esto, el Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC aclara otra vez al interior y exterior la posicion de principios revelando la verdad de la situacion.
					
					Hay un refran coreano que dice: El incendiario grita !fuego!
					
					El culpable principal de la actual situacion grave de la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles que obedecen al imperio. 
					
					Sin embargo, sin tener la conciencia del peligro, actuan como si fueran victimas y tildan a la RPDC de "provocador". 
					
					La imputacion gangsteril de EE.UU. comenzo a entrar en una etapa abierta con la insistencia en "disparo de misil" del reciente lanzamiento legitimo de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC. 
					
					En cuanto al funcionamiento normal de la unidad no. 2 del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3", lo confirmo la comandancia de defensa aeroespacial de America del Norte y lo reconocieron Rusia y otros varios paises del mundo. Y hace poco, un instituto surcoreano dio a la publicidad la filmacion de dicho satelite en su orbita. 
					
					Sin embargo, dando vistas gordas a la realidad, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos se entregan con frenesi a la provocacion anti-RPDC. 
					
					Por doquier del mundo se alzan las voces de denuncia a tal conducta de EE.UU. y sus lacayos como "fraude que mancha la justicia y la conciencia" y "proceder de miopes que no distinguen las faldas de pantalones". 
					
					La "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, aprobada contra el lanzamiento legitimo del satelite de la RPDC fue el preludio de la provocacion mas abierta de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos para incorporar las fuerzas satelites a la campana mundial de aplastamiento y aislamiento anti-RPDC, mientras que los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC desarrollados cerca de dos meses devienen la provocacion militar total y mas brutal que la "resolucion de sancion". 
					
					Insatisfechos con esto, los provocadores introdujeron en el suelo surcoreano y la zona maritima periferica los medios de ataque nuclear de toda indole, entre otros, los colectivos de ataque de superportaaviones de propulsion nuclear cargados de ojivas nucleares, los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-52 y B-2, los submarinos nucleares antibalisticos, los colectivos de destructores con sistemas antibalisticos y la escuadrilla de aviones Stealth F-22 a ser movilizados primero contra los blancos norcoreanos en el periodo inicial de la guerra, y recrudece el nivel de provocacion militar a la etapa de chantaje nuclear mas aventurera. 
					
					La RPDC no cuestiono ninguna vez el lanzamiento de satelite de EE.UU. como disparo de misil ni tuvo el intento de tomarlo como pretexto de la fabricacion de la resolucion de sancion de la ONU. Ni tampoco ejercio la amenaza y chantaje al imperio emplazando en el mar frente a ese pais nuestras fuerzas armadas selectas. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, si no son bandidos con la piel humana, deberan sentir verguenza por sus actos gangsteriles cometidos hasta ahora teniendo en consideracion el sentido de la palabra provocacion.
					
					La premisa de dialogo presentada por EE.UU., segun la cual la RPDC debe demostrar la "voluntad de desnuclearizacion", es una nueva provocacion a ella.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es la invariable voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos tanto en el pasado como en el presente.
					
					La declaracion conjunta sobre la desnuclearizacion, aprobada a principios de la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado por ambas partes coreanas, fue una conquista comun de la nacion presentada y preparada por esta voluntad de la RPDC.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. introdujo las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea y su contorno en confabulacion con los titeres surcoreanos, comenzo a recrudecer el nivel de amenaza y chantaje anti-RPDC e invalido esa preciosa conquista. 
					
					Frente a la cada dia mas siniestra politica hostil y el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., la RPDC se vio obligada a tener las justas fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa.
					
					Pues, seria una insistencia absurda y gangsteril de EE.UU.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos mantendran firmemente las fuerzas armadas nucleares como el medio mas poderoso para defender la soberania y los maximos intereses del pais y asestar el ataque de venganza a los nidos de agresion anti-RPDC hasta que sea desnuclearizado el mundo entero incluso EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos describen como "provocacion" las contramedidas superintransigentes de la RPDC y a la larga, calumnian atrevidamente hasta la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Y censuran la justa voluntad de enfrentamiento de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de hacer frente rotundo a la brutal campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento y las maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC como "fortalecimiento de sistema de sucesor", "elevacion de prestigio" y "consolidacion del sistema interior inestable", lo cual es la mas grave provocacion politica nunca tolerable. 
					
					Tales disparates no pasan de ser una tonteria de los que no saben nada de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos no podran imaginar nunca con sus malas entranas cuan ardientes son las lagrimas de las artilleras felices en el regazo del Comandante Supremo y que es lo que guardan los soldados y civiles aclamando a toda voz "!viva!" en el agua fria del mar hacia su dirigente. 
					
					Mientras que sigan las provocaciones anti-RPDC de toda indole de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, se intensificara cada dia mas el nivel de las contramedidas politicas y militares intransigentes de nuestro ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Si EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos quieren liberarse de la responsabilidad historica de haber llevado a la crisis la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana y salvarse del golpe intransigente de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y desean de veras el dialogo y negociaciones, deben hacer ante todo la decision audaz de tomar las siguientes medidas practicas:
					
					Primero, deben parar de inmediato todos los actos provocativos desarrollados hasta ahora contra la RPDC y pedir disculpas por el respecto. 
					
					Primeramente, han de revocar las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabricadas bajo los pretextos injustos. 
					
					He aqui el comienzo de buena bondad a nuestra parte. Deben tenerlo presente. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben dejar sin demora todas las intrigas anti-RPDC que se trazan vinculando con la RPDC los casos interiores como el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" y "el ataque de hacking del 20 de marzo". 
					
					Segundo, deben garantizar oficialmente a todo el mundo que no volveran a recurrir a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear que ejercen la amenaza o chantaje a la RPDC. 
					
					Son incompatibles jamas el dialogo y el acto de guerra. 
					
					Cuanto mas se intensifiquen los ejercicios de guerra nuclear, tanto mas se empeorara la situacion y se impedira por completo el dialogo.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC no se enganaran nunca por la sofisteria de que los simulacros de guerra nuclear librados en la cara de nosotros son acciones militares anuales de caracter defensivo para proteger EE.UU. y asegurar la seguridad del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Tercero, deben retirar por inmediato todos los medios de guerra nuclear emplazados en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y tomar la decision de abandonar el intento de reintroducirlos. 
					
					Deben tener presente que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana podra ser iniciada desde la retirada de los medios de guerra nuclear introducidos por EE.UU., lo cual se extendera a la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero. 
					
					La duena de Chongwadae no debe olvidarse de que si apoya las armas nucleares de la RPDC como patrimonio comun de la nacion, se abre el futuro radiante, pero, el paraguas nuclear de EE.UU. trae el arruinamiento. 
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana tiene que ver directamente con la paz y seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC observaran atentamente el movimiento posterior de EE.UU. y sus satelites junto con los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz que simpatizan por la justicia y aprecian la conciencia.

articles.title: Dialogo y mejora de relaciones son incompatibles con hostilidad, subraya portavoz de CRPP

Dialogo y mejora de relaciones son incompatibles con hostilidad, subraya portavoz de CRPP

					Tambien, la duena de Chongwadae difamo la dignidad de la RPDC diciendo que "hay que acabar con el circulo vicioso de dialogar y ayudar al Norte si este amenaza y provoca" y el "Norte sera aislado".

articles.content:
Enfrentamiento y dialogo, guerra y paz son incompatibles, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- En la actualidad, las autoridades de alto rango de Estados Unidos dicen a porfia del dialogo agregando que su pais "tiene abierta la puerta para que el Norte de Corea tome otra opcion", "Obama aclaro en varias ocasiones que esta listo para el dialogo y las negociaciones si el Norte de Corea participa con sinceridad en el debate" y "no tiene la intencion de atacar al Norte", etc.

articles.title: Amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. no surtira efecto en RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere a nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo de PTC
articles.content:

					Fortalecer el poderio de defensa nacional tomando como eje las fuerzas armadas nucleares, he aqui el caracter fundamental de la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo del PTC que ha profundizado y desarrollado la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la economia y  la defensa nacional.
					
					La nueva linea del PTC es la estrategica para  intensificar el poderio defensivo del pais mediante el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares legadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y construir un Estado prospero donde los habitantes gocen de opulencia socialista concentrando mayores fuerzas en la construccion economica.
